p: Salted and sun-dried meat is a processed product that is a traditional processed product that is popular in Brazil. This product is based on the sequential application of salt, dehydration and maturation, which prevent the growth of undesirable microorganisms [ 1]; therefore, this method is widely used for conservation purposes [ 2]. Therefore, salted and sun-dried meat scavenge the active forms of reactive oxygen species involved in the initiation step or progression of oxidation, and thus maintain the overall quality of meat [ 3].
